description:
There can be no salvation if there is no threat, no enemy. A dangerous M.J.B.K. turns friend against friend - and, lost in his obsessive desire to become a savior, Akira Kaibuki might be willing to make an enemy of the world itself…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shatter! The One I Must Strike Down
砕け! 討つべきモノ
